definition[0]: the bark (=outer part) of a tree from southern Europe and North Africa, used to make things
definition[1]: a long round piece of cork or plastic which is put into the top of a bottle, especially a wine bottle, to keep liquid inside
definition[2]: to close a bottle by blocking the hole at the top tightly with a long round piece of cork or plastic
definition[3]: the largest county in the Irish Republic
definition[4]: the second largest city in the Irish Republic
